title: Shape Descriptor
description: Schema for the shape service to contain the BioZernike descriptors data that describe PDB volumes at different granularities.

max_order_zernike_invariants.description: The maximum order of Zernike moments (the n index in Ω_nlm) that are stored in the zernike_invariants object.

max_order_zernike_align.description: The maximum order of Zernike moments (the n index in Ω_nlm) that are stored in the zernike_align object.

norm_order.description: 0 is for the special case of the classic Zernike/Novotni invariants (norms of Ω_nlm, a.k.a. 3DZD, a.k.a. fingerprints), any other positive integer represents the order of the Canterakis norm as described in Guzenko et al 2019.

items.description: The value of the Ω_nlm invariant. Only l>=0 is stored (l<0 can be calculated from the corresponding l>0).
The geometric descriptors as defined in the BioZernike library in Descriptor object.
The value of the Ω_nlm original unscaled moment, used for alignment. The hierarchical list of complex numbers is stored as a flattened list of real and imaginary parts (doubles).
Original coordinates of the structure's volume center of mass, used for alignment.

shape_entity_type.description: Type of the object represented by the descriptor, used for independent searches.

major_revision.description: The major version number of the latest revision.

minor_revision.description: The minor version number of the latest revision.

revision_date.description: The release date of the latest revision item.
